## A
```{r}
library(matlib)

A <- matrix(c(4, -2, 0, 5, -2, 1, 3, -4, -1),3, 3, TRUE)
B <- c(2, 7, 3)

solve(A, B)

gaussianElimination(A, B)

showEqn(A, B)

plotEqn3d(A, B)
```
## B
```{r}
library(matlib)
C <- matrix(c(2, 5, 1, -1, 4, 3, 5, 0, -2),3, 3, TRUE)
```

## C
